metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0433 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In blk_mq_queue_tag_busy_iter of blk-mq-tag.c, there is a possible use after free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-151939299

notes.Note: sbeattie> see android advisory for stable backports

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
